questions.prompt: At your cauldron, which base liquid do you pour first?

options.text: Still moonwell water that never ripples.
A glowing ember broth that hisses on contact.
A clear distillate that reveals hidden layers.
A binding syrup that helps ingredients harmonize.

questions.prompt: Mid-brew, thunder shakes the lab. You...

options.text: Lower the flame, shield the pot, and wait for a calm window.
Raise the heat and push through before the storm wins.
Adjust ratios and reroute the process with a backup method.
Keep everyone focused with jokes and a rallying chant.

questions.prompt: A mentor lends you one brewing tool. You choose...

options.text: A cooling stone spoon that steadies volatile mixtures.
A striker rod that ignites any furnace instantly.
A calibration lens that catches tiny measurement drift.
A resonance bell that summons extra hands.

questions.prompt: Other alchemists seek you out for...

options.text: A calming presence when batches get unstable.
A fearless shove when someone is overthinking.
A clean protocol and next-step plan.
A sense of trust that keeps the team unified.
Quiet, uncluttered, and almost meditative.
Loud, kinetic, and full of moving parts.
Labeled, indexed, and optimized for precision.
Warm, social, and full of conversation.

questions.prompt: When a potion might fail, you first...

options.text: Pause, breathe, and reduce variables.
Commit fast and correct course in motion.
Collect more readings before locking in.
Poll the room and brew by shared agreement.

questions.prompt: A partner's batch is collapsing. Your first move is...

options.text: Stabilize the vessel and slow the reaction.
Tell them to act now and salvage aggressively.
Identify the root cause and pick one corrective step.
Reassure them so they can think clearly again.

questions.prompt: Which rare ingredient excites you most?

options.text: Moonmilk dew captured before sunrise.
Spark-salt chipped from a thunderstone.
Script-ink from an ancient grimoire margin.
Dawn-petal pollen that brightens mood.

questions.prompt: An apprentice asks for feedback but is fragile. You...

options.text: Offer gentle guidance now, sharper notes later.
Give the hard truth immediately.
Ask diagnostic questions before prescribing anything.
Frame the lesson as an inspiring story they can follow.

questions.prompt: A risky new potion formula appears. Your instinct is to...

options.text: Secure backups and safety wards before trying it.
Run it tonight and trust your nerve.
Prototype a small batch and test assumptions.
Follow the idea if it feels meaningful and alive.

questions.prompt: During a group brew, momentum is fading. You naturally...

options.text: Keep tempers cool and reactions stable.
Set a finish line and drive everyone forward.
Define scope, sequence, and role ownership.
Reignite morale with a vivid vision of success.
Cool off, then address it calmly and directly.
Call it out on the spot.
Document the pattern and set a hard rule.
Protect your peace by relocating your work.
"Your potions make the room feel steady."
"You attempted what others were afraid to brew."
"You spotted the flaw before anyone else."
"Your brews make people feel wonder again."

questions.prompt: You are exhausted with one final brew step left. You...

options.text: Slow down and finish cleanly.
Push through on raw momentum.
Cut all noise and enter precision mode.
Reconnect to purpose so the effort feels lighter.

questions.prompt: A strange omen appears in your flask. You...

options.text: Note it, stay grounded, and continue methodically.
Chase it immediately to see where it leads.
Track patterns and test what the sign predicts.
Let the mystery breathe and savor its symbolism.

questions.prompt: At your best, your alchemy feels like...

options.text: A dawn tonic: clear, steady, and restorative.
A wildfire draught: bold, fast, and electric.
A clockwork elixir: intentional, exact, and reliable.
A festival cordial: connective, radiant, and hopeful.
